description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience interesting pictures in true stereoscopic 3D! Making use of crossview, anaglyph and wiggle stereoscopy, objects will spring to life before your eyes!!!
description.short: Experience interesting pictures in true stereoscopic 3D! Making use of crossview, anaglyph and wiggle stereoscopy, objects will spring to life before your eyes!!!
